description: This file defines a React functional component named Topbar, which renders a header with branding, a placeholder search input, action buttons including theme toggling, and login/logout buttons based on authentication status.

methods.name: Topbar({ onToggleTheme, themeLabel = 'Toggle theme' })
methods.description: React functional component managing theme toggle, auth status, and rendering top navigation bar.

ctags.name: Topbar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Topbar({ onToggleTheme, themeLabel = 'Toggle theme' }) {$/
